about_the_game:
The player takes on the role of Kyosuke, who took his fiancée, Erisa, to visit a lonely island in the sea. They attended a mysterious festival of the island's god, but the island seemed to be dormant with a great fear from the abyss…in an endless nightmare, the cute fiancée Erisa was abused and assaulted by others – and unspeakable things – at their will, with hardly any clothes on.

“No matter how many times I have to do it, I will save you!”

I believed that I would be with her all my life.



That was why I would never give up so easily.



And in an endless loop, I met a mysterious purple-haired girl. What secrets did this girl and this desert island hold?

◆ Game Features


◇ 24 basic CGs, including more than 300 differentials
◇ Game text: 100,000
◇ Two main female characters and three secondary female characters
◇ A Cthulhu-style game with an infinite flow storyline
◇ Contains group sex, tentacles, and grotesque scenes
◇ Game endings: 2 types

◆Featured Systems


◇Full CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed.
◇Pressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or sexual acts , extreme violence, sexual assault , non-consensual sex, incest , drug abuse, self-harm, suicide, , General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

detailed_description:
The player takes on the role of Kyosuke, who took his fiancée, Erisa, to visit a lonely island in the sea. They attended a mysterious festival of the island's god, but the island seemed to be dormant with a great fear from the abyss…in an endless nightmare, the cute fiancée Erisa was abused and assaulted by others – and unspeakable things – at their will, with hardly any clothes on.

I believed that I would be with her all my life.



That was why I would never give up so easily.



And in an endless loop, I met a mysterious purple-haired girl. What secrets did this girl and this desert island hold?

name: Rescuing You in the Infinite Loop

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Rescuing You in the Infinite Loop - $8.99

package_groups.title: Buy Rescuing You in the Infinite Loop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Kyosuke and his fiancée, Erisa, are visiting an isolated island in the sea and attending a mysterious festival to make a sacrifice to the island's gods. It should have been a romantic holiday, but the island seemed to be overshadowed by a great fear coming from the abyss...
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Russian, Japanese*, Thai, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Korean, Vietnamese, Spanish - Spain, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
